Author: LuKiOMFG
Text: I'm thinking about buying a full length mirror for myself, we only have one small mirror in the bathroom, that you can only fit your head and shoulders into. I haven't seen my full body in over 3 years. I had someone finally notice my weight loss the other day, so obviously I'm smaller, but I don't notice it. It may help my self-confidence if I saw my body, it would show me that I'm not as big is a think I am.
